name: VIVO (itch) (McKinley-64)
description:
VIVO is a Top Down Shoot em up where you play as a Vampire that has to be very careful with his own abilities, since almost EVERYTHING he does, drains his own power at the cost of defeating his enemies.

Defeat your flying enemies while managing your own health in order to not perish.

*Reccoomend putting the game in fullscreen for a better experience

CONTROLS -

Movement => W A S D or Arrow Keys

Shoot => Space Key

Bite Attack => F 

This is my entry for the MiniJam - 92 and probably, my Halloween project of the Year.

I plan to still work on this game, since there is a lot more that I wanted to add to it.

In the meantime, enjoy the game and have fun!

I'm always open for Feedback so don't be afraid to be harsh if anything of this game is actually really bad.

IMPORTANT *PS NOTES: While I did everything form scratch (Art and Programming).

 The music is from a Royalty Stock Free site and on future updates, will be removed once I'm able to finish everything I wanted to implement that I couldnt, including an original score for the game. 

Have a Nice HALLOWEEN.
